game.name: Lost Episodes Alone
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lost Episodes Alone is a first person indie survival horror game. Save your friends from an evil nun named Valak. Collect items and solve puzzles to escape the nightmare. Inspired by games like Resident evil, Slenderman and other horror titles!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lost Episodes Alone is a first person indie survival horror game. Save your friends from an evil nun named Valak. Collect items and solve puzzles to escape the nightmare. Inspired by games like Resident evil, Slenderman and other horror titles!
